item.title: Ehrenbreitstein Fortress Light Festival
item.description:
Interactive Art Installation
As a group project in the working group digital media at the University of Koblenz we created an interactive art installation at the Ehrenbreitstein Fortress Light Festival We used a Microsoft Kinect v2, Unreal Engine 4, stage technology (DMX) and a multi-projector installation to project peoples movements as shadows to historic environments, linking the Ehrenbreitstein Fortress as it is today to its past interactively.
